news_header: A documentary series follows Jusa Harju, a father and cryptocurrency investor, exploring his journey and the world of digital currency.
news_text: The five-part documentary series, starting today, follows Jusa Harju, a 33-year-old father of four, as he navigates the world of cryptocurrency investment over four years. Harju, who became interested in cryptocurrency after investing about $10,000, saw his portfolio grow to $70,000. The series, directed by Tommi Hakko, aims to delve into the emotional aspects of investing, showcasing the challenges and excitement of trading cryptocurrencies. Harju believes that cryptocurrency can solve real-life financial issues, such as expensive and slow money transfers between countries. The documentary highlights the importance of patience and long-term commitment in investing, emphasizing that wealth is not built overnight.
